channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Please i have a 508 server...
and i dont know where i make the player admin on soucer help please

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

there are many ways to do it either go thru characters or do the command ::giveadmin heres for better explain on the characters thing:: edit the player rights.

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = (username)
character-password = (password)

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2034
character-posy = 4536
character-rights = 0 <-------change the 0 to a 2 for admin and 1 for mod goodluck
character-ismember = 0
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = (ip address)
character-lastlogin = 20100214
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 252

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 3751 0
character-equip = 1 14139 0
character-equip = 2 1725 0
character-equip = 3 4587 0
character-equip = 4 2503 0
character-equip = 5 3842 0
character-equip = 6 -1 0
character-equip = 7 2497 0
character-equip = 8 -1 0
character-equip = 9 7462 0
character-equip = 10 3105 0
character-equip = 11 -1 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 0
character-look = 2 1
character-look = 3 2
character-look = 4 0
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 1 0
character-skill = 1 1 0
character-skill = 2 1 0
character-skill = 3 99 2324255
character-skill = 4 1 0
character-skill = 5 1 0
character-skill = 6 1 0
character-skill = 7 1 0
character-skill = 8 1 0
character-skill = 9 1 0
character-skill = 10 1 0
character-skill = 11 1 0
character-skill = 12 1 0
character-skill = 13 1 0
character-skill = 14 1 0
character-skill = 15 1 0
character-skill = 16 1 0
character-skill = 17 1 0
character-skill = 18 1 0
character-skill = 19 1 0
character-skill = 20 1 0
character-skill = 21 1 0
character-skill = 22 1 0
character-skill = 23 1 0
character-skill = 24 1 0

[ITEMS]

[BANK]

[FRIENDS]

[IGNORES]

[EOF]
